content: The extraordinary greatness of the Roman Empire manifests itself above all in three things: the aqueducts, the paved roads, and the construction of the drains.
translations: ita:La straordinaria grandezza dell'Impero Romano si manifesta soprattutto in tre coseï¹• gli acquedotti, le strade lastricate
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
